title: CLINICAL TRIAL ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
description: Defines various different information concerning a CLINICAL TRIAL. E.g. information about Sponsoring/Funding, Scientific Study Type, ...

displaySequenceNumber.title: displaySequenceNumber
displaySequenceNumber.description: Defining the sequence the different CLINICAL TRIAL ADDITIONAL INFORMATION are displayed.

name.title: informationName
name.description: Defines the name of the Information

valueDate.title: valueDate
valueDate.description: The date on which the value (Numeric Value or (Short Text and Long Text) was set.

valueLongText.title: longText
valueLongText.description: The long text or term as value of the information; if applicable. This corresponds usually to the Short Text.

valueNumeric.title: numericValue
valueNumeric.description: The numeric value of the information; if applicable

valueShortText.title: shortText
valueShortText.description: The short text or code as value of the information; if applicable. This corresponds usually to the Long Text.

clinicalTrialBiNumber.title: clinicalTrial.biClinicalTrialNumber
clinicalTrialBiNumber.description:
BI Clinical Trial Number is the BI internal number of the CLINICAL TRIAL.
"Study" is renamed to "clinical trial" therfore all properties are renamed accordingly.

clinicalTrialImpactId.title: clinicalTrial.impactClinicalTrialId
clinicalTrialImpactId.description: The system generated clinical trial identifier.

clinicalTrialEudractNumber.title: clinicalTrial.eudractNumber
clinicalTrialEudractNumber.description:
The EudraCT registry number assigned to the clinical trial, if applicable.
The number is composed of three parts: YYYY-NNNNNN-CC
•	YYYY - The year
•	NNNNNN - A six digit number
•	CC - Two control digits
